page.text: Welcome to my text adventure!
You can turn the pages of the book
using the buttons to the right.
You can also use:
comma and period (, .)
brackets ([ ])
left and right arrow keys
To close the book, press the
return button. The space bar and
the letter x will also work to
close the book.
Books will be found all throughout
the world and will contain
information about the history of
the world, different places in the
game, and there will be books you
wrote yourself! You'll be able to
keep a journal of your travels
and record any information you
feel might find useful later in
your adventures.
The game will start out you
hearing news of the launch of
the Sputnik 1 satellite by the
Soviet Union as a child. This
event and the choices you make
will decide what your role
plays in your future and the
future of others.
You could become a man of
science, politics, education,
war, religion or something
else entirely.
Play your role in preventing
or causing a world war.
The game encourages exploration
and creating your own path through
the story. Choosing to make a text
adventure came from being limited
by the amount of resources to
create the size of world I wanted
that also contained the level of
detail. The easy input of text
commands will allow you to
interact with objects and perform
more complex actions.
Ask an NPC any question, or
compliment them about their wife
husband, shoes, or promotion. You
could light a fire and throw
everything they own into it, if
that's what you're into.
The game centers around you
doing whatever you want and
making that as easy as possible.
The world will be made up of
different scenes. Some will have
an image and animation, others
will not. It would not be
possible to create enough image
representations of each scene.
The text will always be the main
tool to illustrate a scene. An
animation may sometimes be next
to the text to help portray a
complicated environment or fill
out a scene in ways text can't.
Different people you meet in
the world will have their own
unique history, just like you.
Your interactions with them and
people their associated with can
affect their future.
This game is being worked on
when I have both inspiration and
time. I am focusing on the game
engine primarily right now. I need
to make the creation of scenes and
interactions as simple as I can to
allow the scale of game I want
this project to become.
